sentences.sContent: In other words, you need to succinctly state what your application does.
sentences.sContent_eng: In other words, you need to succinctly state what your application does.
sentences.sCn: 换句话说，您需要简洁地描述应用程序完成的工作。

sentences.sContent: That was partly because, even if his message bore no relation to his actions, it expressed precisely and succinctly what he should have been doing.
sentences.sContent_eng: That was partly because, even if his message bore no relation to his actions, it expressed precisely and succinctly what he should have been doing.
sentences.sCn: 这一部分是因为，即使他的讯息和行为之间找不到任何联系，但他清晰、简洁地传达了本该做的事情。
